UPDATE mall_order a LEFT JOIN item_sku b ON a.sku_code=b.sku_code SET a.item_code=b.item_code,a.sku_code=b.id,a.upc=b.upc,a.weight=b.weight,a.item_name=b.item_name,a.sku_pic=b.sku_pic,a.logistic_type=b.logistic_type WHERE a.channel_order_no IN
#{item}
UPDATE outer_order_detail SET upc=#{upc} WHERE (upc!=#{upc} or upc is null) and sku_id=#{skuId}
UPDATE outer_order_detail SET weight=#{weight} WHERE (weight!=#{weight} or weight is null) and sku_id=#{skuId}
